channel.title: Need a Client & Source which lets me edit!
channel.description:
Hey i there has been a few client and servers iv downloaded which i cannnot edit..
then there has been a few which the client wont even open etc...
So im looking for one i can edit 100% (anti-leech) because i want to be able to add and remove npc's and much more, all i need is a basic client/source so i have the basic stuff... but i still want to make it my own style

item.title: Need a Client & Source which lets me edit!
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

Go to server download section…
Look for DealtascapeCleaned for a source with almost nothing, than you only have the world etc and you can edit everything yourself.

Read full topic
